title: Bug 102516 JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516 JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source. Currently, all the tables and columns are loaded when the page is loaded.
OB: Currently, all the tables and columns are loaded when the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query is loaded.
EB: The tables and columns should be loaded on demand, meaning they should be loaded only when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query.
2. Verify that all the tables and columns are loaded when the page is loaded.
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter and observe if the tables and columns are loaded on demand.
